name: Jem's Delivery Service
description:
Happy Holidays from the Hopes to yours!

----

Use ARROWS or WASD to move. SPACEBAR or movement to continue.

Made in Bitsy (V 7.2).

Utilizing Pixsy by ruin (Old Version)

Directional Avatar, Multi-Sprite Avatar, Transparent sprites hacks by Sean + the Exit from Dialogue hack by mildmojo and utilized via Borsky.

Bitsymuse hack by David Mowatt utilized via Candle's Bitsymuse UI.
